SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.actions

Class Actions

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.actions.Actions
public class Actions extends Object
Provides action methods that can be called from YAML configuration files. This class contains static methods that represent various game actions and operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • Actions

      public Actions()

  • Method Details

    • start_game

      public static void start_game()
      Starts a new game session. Called when the player initiates a new game.

    • exit_game

      public static void exit_game()
      Exits the game application. Called when the player chooses to quit the game.

    • open_help

      public static void open_help()
      Opens the game settings menu. Called when the player wants to view or modify game settings.

    • pause_game

      public static void pause_game()
      Pauses the game. Called when the player wants to pause the game.

    • resume_game

      public static void resume_game()
      Resumes the game from a paused state. Called when the player wants to continue playing after pausing.

    • to_main_menu

      public static void to_main_menu()
      Returns to the main menu of the game. Called when the player wants to go back to the main menu.

    • next_level

      public static void next_level()
      Proceeds to the next level in the game. Called when the player completes the current level.
      Parameters:
      scene - The name of the next level scene file

    • restart_game

      public static void restart_game()
      Restarts the current game session. Called when the player wants to start the game over.
